character.name: Tester Testerson
character.title: Quality Assurance Specialist of the Testing Realm
character.description: A dedicated tester who ensures all systems work properly before release. Known for finding edge cases and breaking things in creative ways.

banterDialogue.text: Hello! I'm here to test all the dialogue systems. Everything seems to be working perfectly so far!
Let me check if the error handling is working... *attempts to break something* Excellent! The system recovered gracefully!
